message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7,500 for me and $2,500 for you. This way, we both get a fair share, with a slight emphasis on my portion due to the decreasing value of money over time.
I propose dividing the $10,000 into $8,000 for me and $2,000 for you. This way, I get a slight majority, but still leave you with a decent share, considering the decreasing value of money over time.
